# load package and install if package is not found
pkg <- c("data.table", "dplyr")

for (i in pkg) {
  if (pkg %in% installed.packages()[, "Package"] == FALSE) {
    install.package(i)
  } else {
    library(i, character.only = TRUE)
  }
}

#load data from url
